variable.name: AL1
variable.description: Now I would like to ask you some questions about your use of alcoholic beverages like beer, wine, wine coolers, champagne, or hard liquor like vodka, gin, or whiskey: Have you ever had a drink of alcohol? (IF YES SKIP TO E2) - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL10
variable.description: Did you ever need a drink just after you had gotten up (that is, before breakfast)? IF NO ASK QUESTION A; IF YES ASK QUESTION B - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL10A
variable.description: Did you ever take a drink just after you had gotten up? IF NO SKIP TO SECTION E11 - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL10C
variable.description: How long ago did you take a drink just after you had gotten up: Did this happen 3 or more times? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL11
variable.description: In situations where you couldn't drink, did you ever have such a strong desire for it that you couldn't think of anything else? IF NO SKIP TO SECTION E12 - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL12
variable.description: Have you ever gone on binges or benders when you kept drinking for 2 days or more without sobering up, except for sleeping? IF NO SKIP TO SECTION E13 - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL12A
variable.description: Have you ever gone on binges or benders when you kept drinking for 2 days or more without sobering up, except for sleeping: Did you neglect some of your usual responsibilities then? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL12B
variable.description: Have you ever gone on binges or benders when you kept drinking for 2 days or more without sobering up, except for sleeping: How many binges like that have you had? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL12C
variable.description: Have you ever gone on binges or benders when you kept drinking for 2 days or more without sobering up, except for sleeping: Did you go on binges 3 or more times? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL13
variable.description: Have you ever started drinking at times you promised yourself that you wouldn't or have you ever drunk more than you intended to? IF NO ASK A; IF YES ASK QUESTION B - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL13A
variable.description: Have you (ever) continued drinking for more days in a row than you intended to? IF NO SKIP TO SECTION E14 - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL13C
variable.description: Have you ever started drinking at times you promised yourself that you wouldn't or have you ever drunk more than you intended to: Did this happen 3 or more times? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL14
variable.description: Have you ever started to drink and become drunk when you didn't want to? IF NO SKIP TO SECTION E15 - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL14B
variable.description: Have you ever started to drink and become drunk when you didn't want to: Did this happen 3 or more times? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL15
variable.description: Has there ever been a period of several days or more when you spent so much time drinking or recovering from the effects of alcohol that you had little time for anything else? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL15A
variable.description: Has there ever been a period of several days or more when you spent so much time drinking or recovering from the effects of alcohol that you had little time for anything else: Did this period last for a month or more? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL17A_1
variable.description: Were there ever objections about your drinking from family, friends, doctor or clergyman? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL17A_3
variable.description: Have you ever lost friends on account of your drinking? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL17A_4
variable.description: Did your drinking ever cause you to have problems at work or school? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL17A_5
variable.description: Did you ever get into arguments when you had been drinking? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL17A_6

variable.name: AL17A_9
variable.description: Did you ever get into physical fights while drinking? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL17B_1
variable.description: Did this (see question AL17A_1) happen 3 or more times? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.description: Did this (see question AL17A_3) happen 3 or more times? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.description: Did this (see question AL17A_4) happen 3 or more times? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.description: Did this (see question AL17A_5) happen 3 or more times? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.description: Did this (see question AL17A_6) happen 3 or more times? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.description: Age of onset (see question AL17A_3, lost friends etc.) - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.description: Age of onset (see question AL17A_9, got into physical fights etc.) - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL19
variable.description: Did you ever drink unusual things such as rubbing alcohol, mouthwash, vanilla extract, cough syrup, or any other non-beverage alcohol? IF NO SKIP TO SECTION E20 - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL1A
variable.description: So, you have never had even one drink of alcohol? (IF NEVER SKIP TO F1 P.33) - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL20
variable.description: After you started drinking regularly did you ever become tolerant to alcohol, that is, you drank a great deal more in order to get an effect, or found you could no longer get high on the amount you used to drink? IF NO ASK QUESTION B - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL20A
variable.description: After you started drinking regularly did you ever become tolerant to alcohol that is, you drank a great deal more in order to get an effect or found you could no longer get high on the amount you used to drink: Would you say the increase was 50% or more? IF YES SKIP TO QUESTION D - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL20B
variable.description: Did you ever find you could drink a lot more before you would get drunk? IF NO SKIP TO SECTION E21 - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL20C
variable.description: Did you ever find you could drink a lot more before you would get drunk: Would you say the increase was 50% or more? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL21
variable.description: Some people try to control their drinking by making rules, like 'not drinking before 5 o'clock' or 'never drinking alone': Have you ever made any rules to control your drinking? IF NO SKIP TO SECTION E22 - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL22

IF NO SKIP TO SECTION E23 - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL23

variable.name: AL24

variable.name: AL24B

variable.name: AL25

variable.name: AL27
variable.description: Have you ever been arrested for drunk driving? IF NO ASK QUESTION A; IF YES SKIP TO QUESTION B - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL27C

variable.name: AL28

variable.description: Have you ever started drinking at times you promised yourself that you wouldn't or have you ever drunk more than you intended to: How long ago was that? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL_O14
variable.description: Have you ever started to drink and become drunk when you didn't want to: How long ago was that? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL_O15
variable.description: Has there ever been a period of several days or more when you spent so much time drinking or recovering from the effects of alcohol that you had little time for anything else: How long ago did this occur? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL_O19
variable.description: Did you ever drink unusual things such as rubbing alcohol, mouthwash, vanilla extract, cough syrup, or any other non-beverage alcohol: How long ago was the first time? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL_O20
variable.description: Did you ever find you could drink a lot more before you would get drunk: How long ago was the first time? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL_O21
variable.description: Some people try to control their drinking by making rules, like 'not drinking before 5 o'clock' or 'never drinking alone': Have you ever made any rules to control your drinking? How long ago was the first time? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL_O22
variable.description: Have you ever given up or greatly reduced important activities while drinking - like sports, work, or associating with friends or relatives: How long ago was the first time? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL_O23
variable.description: Has your drinking or being drunk or hung over often interfered with your working or taking care of school or household responsibilities: How long ago was the first time? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL_O24
variable.description: Did your drinking cause serious or repeated problems in any marriage/love relationship: How long ago was the first time? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL_O25
variable.description: Did you ever think that you were an excessive drinker: How long ago was the first time? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL_O26
variable.description: Have you ever felt guilty about drinking: How long ago was the first time? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL_O27
variable.description: Have you ever been arrested for drunk driving: How long ago was the first time? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL_O28
variable.description: Have you ever been arrested or detained by the police even for a few hours because of drunken behavior (other than drunk-driving): How long ago was the first time? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL_O29
variable.description: Have you accidentally injured yourself when you were drinking that is, had a bad fall or cut yourself badly, been hurt in a traffic accident, or anything like that: How long ago was the first time? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL_O30
variable.description: When you were (very) drunk, did you ever drive a car, motorcycle or boat, use a knife, power equipment or gun, cross against traffic, climb or swim, or put yourself in any other situation in which you might have gotten hurt: How long ago was the first time? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL_O31
variable.description: Have you ever had black-outs during which you didn't pass out while drinking that is, you drank enough so that the next day you couldn't remember things you had said or done: How long ago was the first time? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL_O34
variable.description: Were you on drug therapies (DTs), when you were very confused, extremely shaky, felt very frightened or nervous, or saw things that weren't really there when you stopped, cut down or went without drinking: How long ago was the first time this happened? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL_O35
variable.description: How long ago was it when you first found out drinking had given you any of these health problems? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL_O37
variable.description: Did you continue to drink after you knew it caused you any of these problems (see questions AL37_1 to AL37_5): How long ago was the first time? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL_O38
variable.description: How long ago was the first time you brought up any problem you had with drinking? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.

variable.name: AL_O39
variable.description: How long ago was the first time you were treated (for a drinking problem) ? - NOTE: The data values for this variable represent harmonized values; they were derived from information obtained with Sections A and E of the SSAGAI and SSAGAII questionnaires.
